justification: Client budget signal detected, existing working solution reduces risk and timeline, confident in scope based on proven architecture

analysis_and_planning.description: Review existing codebase, identify bugs, plan adaptation strategy

storage_and_recording.description: MongoDB schema, S3 integration, recording persistence

playback_functionality.description: Audio player UI, transcript sync, retrieval API

report_generation.description: Structured report format, timestamp aggregation, export functionality

gitlab_deployment.description: CI/CD setup, staging and production deployment

assumptions: Client provides GitLab access and API keys
Existing codebase is accessible for review
Bug inventory will be discovered during initial analysis
Standard MERN stack setup (no unusual infrastructure)
Deepgram or similar transcription API already in use

risks.risk: Vague report requirements may require additional clarification rounds
risks.mitigation: Include 2 revision rounds in fixed price, clarify format early

risks.risk: Unknown bugs may be more complex than expected
risks.mitigation: Cap bug fix hours at 4, escalate if critical issues found

risks.risk: Client infrastructure may have unusual constraints
risks.mitigation: Discovery call to validate assumptions before starting

value_proposition: Fixed price eliminates budget uncertainty, existing working solution reduces risk, proven architecture ensures faster delivery than building from scratch
